body.name: Cetaphil 16oz Cracked Skin Repair Lotion - Hypoallergenic, Fragrance Free, 24hr Hydration for Sensitive, Rough, Cracked Skin
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 15% on your first Subscribe and Save order.

features: CETAPHIL CRACKED SKIN REPAIR LOTION: Daily use lotion designed to hydrate and repair rough, cracked skin, and prevent cracked skin from coming back
RESTORES AND HEALS CRACKED SKIN: Formula with skin protectant dimethicone is clinically proven to improve the integrity of the skin barrier and heal from the inside out
HYDRATES AND PROTECTS ALL DAY: Urea enriched formula immediately hydrates and then continuously draws moisture into the skin for 24 hours
GENTLE ON SENSITIVE SKIN: The hypoallergenic, fragrance free, non-comedogenic and non-irritating formula is suitable for even the most sensitive skin, including diabetic skin
body.description: CETAPHIL Cracked Skin Repair Lotion is clinically proven to protect and prevent extremely dry cracked, sensitive skin. The skin protectant dimethicone creates a physical barrier that locks in moisture, while urea draws in moisture to hydrate skin for 24 hours. Recommended for daily maintenance and repair of cracked skin to reveal significantly softer and smoother skin in just one month. This repairing lotion can help hydrate and restore skin and cuticles left dry by repeated hand washing or use of hand sanitizer. The hypoallergenic formula will not clog pores or irritate dry, sensitive skin, and it defends against 5 signs of skin sensitivity. For complete care of your cracked skin, use together with CETAPHIL Cracked Skin Balm to repair deeper cracks and target drier areas such as hands, feet, knees and elbows.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dry, cracked skin is caused by a variety of factors that result in a lack of moisture in the skin, particularly around the hands and feet, leaving skin feeling rough and irritated. Triggers can include cold weather, arid conditions, excessively hot or cold showers or hand washing, and even chronic conditions like diabetes. This fast absorbing lotion heals skin from the inside out, hydrating and drawing moisture into the skin with urea, a humectant that helps skin retain moisture and softens rough skin. It also contains 2% dimethicone, a known skin protectant that helps to seal in moisture. CETAPHIL Cracked Skin Repair Lotion provides daily maintenance for dry, cracked skin and is clinically proven to effectively protect, soothe and hydrate, leaving sensitive skin feeling softer and smoother. 100% of users felt cracked skin was softer and more moisturized after use. Tackle sensitive skin with the help of CETAPHIL. A weakened skin barrier lets more water out while letting irritants in, both of which can lead to dryness and sensitivity. By strengthening and reinforcing the skin barrier, CETAPHIL skin care products defend against 5 signs of skin sensitivity - dryness, irritation, roughness, tightness and a weakened skin barrier.

CETAPHIL is a Dermatologist Recommended Sensitive Skincare Brand used around the world by millions of people with sensitive skin* *IQVIA 2022 CETAPHIL moisturizers deliver long lasting hydration to replenish and protect the skin's moisture barrier from dryness CETAPHIL skincare products are developed with and clinically tested by dermatologists. *IQVIA 2022

Hydrate and protect dry, cracked skin CETAPHIL Cracked Skin Repair Lotion is formulated to hydrate and protect dry, cracked skin, helping to heal skin from the inside out. It creates a physical barrier to lock in moisture for 24 hour hydration, improves the integrity of the natural skin barrier and soothes irritation caused by continuously dry, cracked skin. Daily maintenance of dry, cracked skin Formulated with dimethicone and urea, this hydrating lotion is designed for daily repair and prevention of dry, cracked skin. Skin feels instantly soothed, and significantly softer and smoother after 1 month of use. The lightweight and non-greasy lotion absorbs quickly for comfortable, everyday hydration. Dermatologist developed for your sensitive skin Dermatologist tested for use on sensitive skin, CETAPHIL Cracked Skin Repair Lotion is non-comedogenic, hypoallergenic and fragrance free, so it won't clog pores or cause irritation. Suitable for even the most sensitive skin, including diabetic skin. Complete your sensitive skin care routine with CETAPHIL A daily skin care routine with CETAPHIL cleansers and moisturizers designed for your skin type will help to defend against 5 signs of skin sensitivity and leave your skin feeling softer and soothed. For complete care of cracked skin, pair with CETAPHIL Cracked Skin Balm to protect and repair deeper cracks and target drier areas such as hands, feet, knees and elbows.

Restoraderm Soothing Wash Restoraderm Eczema Soothing Moisturizer Daily Smoothing Moisturizer for Rough & Bumpy Skin Cracked Skin Repair Lotion Cracked Skin Repair Balm Healing Ointment Skincare benefit Creamy, hydrating cleanser is clinically proven to moisturize dry skin while cleansing Daily moisturizer soothes and hydrates dry itchy, irritated eczema-prone skin Daily use moisturizer gently exfoliates bumps and smooths rough patches to improve skin's texture Daily use lotion designed to hydrate and repair rough, cracked skin and prevent cracks from coming back Hydrating Balm protects cracked skin to promote healing of very rough and cracked skin Multi-purpose ointment is specially formulated with a high concentration of skin protectant to quickly protect and heal Skin type Dry, Stressed Sensitive Skin Dry, Itch Sensitive Skin Rough and Bumpy, Sensitive Skin Cracked Sensitive Skin Cracked Sensitive Skin Dry, Chapped and Irritated Sensitive Skin Key ingredients Filaggrin Technology, Colloidal Oatmeal, Vitamins B3 & E Colloidal Oatmeal, Ceramide & Filaggrin Technology, Vitamins B3 & E Urea 20%, Glycerin Dimethicone, Urea Dimethicone, Glycerin, Beta Glucan Petrolatum, Shea Butter, Vitamin E Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Won't clog pores (Non-comedogenic) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Fragrance-free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to dry skin
reviews.reviewText: It has quite thick texture, so hard to apply. But still very good quality. It is especially very helpful to make dry skin smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have dry skin and this cream is best I've ever found!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Will Heal Your Cracked Heels
reviews.reviewText: For years, I've had callouses and cracked heels and nothing seemed to work, even a prescription cream. I was very diligent about using this every night for 2 weeks and saw an amazing transformation. It is a little greasy but I did apply it very liberally. There is no heavy scent. I now apply it every other day to maintain the results. I highly recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great hydration, not greasy
reviews.reviewText: This does a great job moisturizing my skin especially after too much Sun and pool chemicals. It does not have a scent to clash with my perfume and works well in that regard for men as well. It takes a little while to absorb but leaves my skin so soft and healthy feeling. It spreads easily. I hate really thick lotions that take forever to spread and go on white like paste. This will not do that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works, Eucerin better
reviews.reviewText: It does take a little bit of time for the lotion to absorb into the skin but it works for my cracked skin. I like Eucerin original healing cream better though. This Cetaphil lotion after some time my cracked skin starts to really hurt and only feels better after applying this lotion again or the Eucerin healing cream. My skin never hurts when I use the healing cream though even when my skin dries out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Face Moisturizer Yet!
reviews.reviewText: Who knew! All the anti-aging creams out there and I came across this for my dry feet and arms per my MD. I applied it to my face and neck and was amazed at the difference in my appearance! I looked younger! It's crazy! I am going to purchase the body wash as well. I am so pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like it. Ii keep me hydrated until next bath.
